column1: Raniganj is a neighbourhood in Asansol of the Paschim Bardhaman district in the Indian state of West Bengal. It is governed by Asansol Municipal Corporation
Raniganj is located at 23.62°N 87.13°E﻿ / 23.62; 87.13. It has an average elevation of 91 metres (298 feet).
